Refund as an option patrons can vote on ($50)
Admins can revoke refund option and redistribute votes inside as unused voted ($50)

Make the menu a dropdown with about, create, explore for portals and pacts. Move content from home to about for prizes.

Add ability for admin to hide campaigns ($25)
Include goal and deadline as options for gofundme and store it in the backend and not the smart contract so that way they are editable ($25)
Include a way for the user to edit their campaigns up until admin approves it and they can edit rejected campaigns and resubmit ($50)
Add ability for the author to add updates to either type of campaign ($25)
Add comments under any campaign type ($50)
Adjust cards and detail of campaigns in prizes to look similar to portals ($25)

In explore page show proposer, funding goal, total contribution amount, deadline, what stage its in such as submissions open or voting or ended, and skillset and values tags on the small prize windows. (Maybe also how many submissions so far if that doesn't make it too crowded) ($50)
Integrate onramp (Either Transak or Unlimit) ($100)
Privy wallet adjustments so users to find their private key and can send and receive funds ($100)
Ability to sign up to a prize as a pursuer and show the pursuers in the details ($50)
Ability to form teams when pursuing prizes with a multisig wallet they can create, and a leaderboard of individuals and teams for how much they've won ($200)
Ability to split funds across recipient wallets for kickstarter and gofundme ($50)

Dashboard for home page, portal page, and prize page that shows onchain stats. Stats for home page: Total contributions, total number of campaigns, total number of users. Stats for prize page: Total prize funding won, number of prizes won, total number of campaigns. Stats for portal page: Total contributions, total number of campaigns ($100)
Dashboard in user profile that shows same stats as in each of those pages ($50)
Indexing to improve loading speed of both explore pages ($100)
Switch to proxy smart contracts ($50)
Switch to USDC on OP once we have gasless tx ($50)
